text: Deyan Ivanov (; born 12 April 1996) is a Bulgarian footballer who currently plays as a Centre back for Levski Sofia. ==Career== Ivanov made his league debut for Levski against Marek Dupnitsa during the 2014–15 campaign. Levski won 6–0 and Ivanov played the full 90 minutes on the pitch. In October 2015 he suffered a severe injury that took him for a year and a half. After a recovery in Italy, he signs a new 3-year contract with Levski Sofia In July 2017, he was loaned to Second League club Botev Vratsa. In the last match of the season, Ivanov scored the winning goal in the 89th minute which secured Botev's first place in the league and the promotion to first league.Трилър във Враца! Ботев се завърна в елита с късен гол! ==References== ==External links== * * Profile at levski.bg * Profile at LevskiSofia.info Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Sofia Category:Bulgarian footballers Category:First Professional Football League (Bulgaria) players Category:Second Professional Football League (Bulgaria) players Category:PFC Levski Sofia players Category:FC Botev Vratsa players Category:Association football defenders
title: Deyan Ivanov
